ERROR_REQUIRED_QUESTIONS: Please answer correctly to required questions.
ERROR_VALID_PASSWORD: Please provide a valid password. (10 characters: at least one uppercase, lowercase and one number)
ERROR_VALID_PHONE: Please provide a valid phone number (for example +306934303600). Add +30 at the beginning for a Greek Number. Do note use spaces between the numbers!
ERROR_VALID_EMAIL: Please provide a valid email address (for example max@gmail.com).
SUBMIT_FORM_VALIDATION: Are you sure you want to submit your answer? If you want to leave and edit it later, save it.

WELCOME_VIEW.TITLE: Apply in order to learn coding & work as a developer
WELCOME_VIEW.CREATE_ACCOUNT_BUTTON: Create your account to start the application process
WELCOME_VIEW.ALREADY_REGISTERED_BUTTON: I have already created my account
WELCOME_VIEW.NO_OPENED_LOCATIONS: No locations are currently opened. Please come back in few days
WELCOME_VIEW.DESCRIPTION:
Apply in order to learn coding & work as a developer. You can apply for the class, if you really want (and need) to start working as a developer, in Greece or abroad and you are

  • Refugee & Migrant (asylum seeker or with residence permit)
  • or 12-month unemployed (with OAED Card)

This course lasts for 7-months and is free of charge for you! Classes take place, 3 afternoons per week, from 6-8 pm and/or 8-10pm.
Please read the full details here before applying: socialhackersacademy.org/coding-school
WELCOME_VIEW.OFFICE_LOCATION: Come to our classroom (see on the map) if you have questions or you need help in the application process! It is open every day from 11am - 6pm.
WELCOME_VIEW.ANY_QUESTION: If you have any questions, please email us at: admissions@socialhackersacademy.org

LOGIN_VIEW.TITLE: Enter your email & password you have already created, to log in!

FORGOT_PASSWORD_VIEW.DESCRIPTION: To reset your password, enter your email below and submit. An email will be sent to you with instructions about how to complete the process

SUCCESS_MESSAGES.FORGOT_PASSWORD: If an account is registered with the email address "{{ mailAddress }}", you should get an email there with your new password soon
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.APPLICATION: Thank your for your creating your account in the platform. You can now fill all the steps of the application process, to join the class!
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.SAVING_FORM: Your progress has been saved, you can edit it later and submit it when you finish
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.SUBMITTING_FORM: Thank you for submitting your step, Social Hackers Academy Team will come back to you soon. In the meantime, please move on with the next application step!
SUCCESS_MESSAGES.LOGGED_IN: You are now logged in. You can log-out when you want with the button in the top right corner. Don't forget your password, to log-in in the future!

BUTTONS.SAVE: I want to leave, save my answers and I will return later!
BUTTONS.SUBMIT: I am sure with my answers, submit my answers!

SUMMARY_VIEW.WELCOME_DESCRIPTION: In this page, you will find your current progress, you have to complete all these steps. You can do it in the order you prefer. You can save your answers and submit them later, or submit them directly!

ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.TODO_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that you have not yet completed this step, you have to answer and submit it (the number is the index of the step)
ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.PENDING_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that your answers are waiting an approval from Social Hackers Academy, it would come soon
ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.REJECTED_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that unfortunately, your answer was rejected by Social Hackers Academy: you can find on your emails some comments about it. You have to submit it again
ICONS_DESCRIPTIONS.VALIDATED_ICON_DESCRIPTION: means that your answer was accepted by Social Hackers Academy, perfect!

SUMMARY_VIEW.DEADLINE_TEXT: You have to complete all these steps before the {{ deadline }}
SUMMARY_VIEW.HELP_NOTE: If you have any question or the platform has problems, don't hesitate to contact Social Hackers Academy (email, Facebook or directly in our office)

RESULTS_BOX.ACCEPTED: Congratulation, you are now part of Social Hackers Academy. Check your emails to know when it starts!
RESULTS_BOX.REJECTED: Unfortunately, you will not join our programm right now. A member of our team will contact you to explain to you the reasons that you got rejected and give you feedback on your application and how you can improve it! In any case, you can apply to next classes, that will be launched soon in our Academy. Check your e-mails often!
